messages.subject: I love this list!
messages.msgSnippet: I was away from the computer for two days and came back to *tons* of email!! You all have been very busy lately! lol The conversations got heated and even a
messages.messageBody:
I was away from the computer for two days and came back to *tons* of email!!
You all have been very busy lately! lol The conversations got heated and
even a few words were exchanged and in the end things settled down. Then I
realized (when I was finally able to get to the last digest) that I had
learned a lot! Wow...

I, for one, am glad that people express their opions, even those with rather
UN unschooling opinions. It helps me to contrast where I am in relation to
both sides of the issue. It helps me to see more clearly the direction I
would like to head in. So, I thank all of you for your input. You make an
interesting read. :)

~Sheri
